meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of microlepidoptera.
meanings.sent1: The tiny, microlepidopterous wings shimmered in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the behavior of microlepidopterous insects in their natural habitat.
meanings.sent3: The microlepidopterous caterpillar wore a tiny top hat to the insect ball.
meanings.sent4: Her garden was a microlepidopterous paradise, with fluttering wings like delicate petals.
meanings.sent5: The children marveled at the intricate patterns on the microlepidopterous wings.

meanings.definition: A small moth of the family Microlepidoptera.
meanings.sent1: The microlepidopterous fluttered gracefully among the flowers.
meanings.sent2: A collector carefully pinned the rare microlepidopterous specimen in his display case.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat chased the microlepidopterous around the garden.
meanings.sent4: In the moonlight, the microlepidopterous seemed like a fairy come to life.
meanings.sent5: The tiny microlepidopterous rested on the leaf, its wings a mosaic of colors.
